totalcross.hardware.camera

Class Camera

  • totalcross.lang.Object

extends totalcross.lang.Object

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String captureImage()
      Captures an image using the currently opened camera

    • Constructor Detail

      • Camera

        public Camera()

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public static void open()
                 throws CameraException
        Opens the device camera using the default parameters. When successfully opened, a camera preview will be added to the screen. If the camera was already open, it will be reset
        Throws:
        CameraException - happens when a camera is not available or present

      • open

        public static void open(CameraProperties properties)
                 throws CameraException
        Opens the device camera using the given parameters. When successfully opened, a camera preview will be added to the screen. If the camera was already open, it will be reset to the given parameters
        Throws:
        CameraException - happens when a camera is not available or present

      • close

        public static void close()
        Closes the current opened camera. If the camera is closed, nothing happens.

      • captureImage

        public static String captureImage()
        Captures an image using the currently opened camera
        Returns:
        the path to the captured image
